recipeList.name: Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce.
recipeList.method: Cook spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water, according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet over medium heat, heat olive oil. Add onion and garlic and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.Add crushed tomatoes and bring to a simmer. Cook for 10-15 minutes until the sauce has thickened.Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti. Garnish with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh basil leaves, if desired.

recipeList.name: Baked Chicken Breasts.
recipeList.method: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).Rub chicken breasts with olive oil and seasonings, making sure to coat both sides evenly.Place chicken breasts in a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C). Remove from the oven and let rest for 5 minutes before serving.

recipeList.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipeList.method: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt. In a large bowl, cream together butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs and vanilla until well combined. Gradually stir in the flour mixture until a dough forms. Fold in chocolate chips.Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from the oven and let cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

Add onion and garlic and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.Add crushed tomatoes and bring to a simmer. Cook for 10-15 minutes until the sauce has thickened.Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti. Garnish with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh basil leaves, if desired.

recipeList.name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Balsamic Glaze
recipeList.method: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).Rub chicken breasts with olive oil and seasonings, making sure to coat both sides evenly.Place chicken breasts in a baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C). Remove from the oven and let rest for 5 minutes before serving.

recipeList.name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad with Feta and Olives
recipeList.method: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt. In a large bowl, cream together butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs and vanilla until well combined. Gradually stir in the flour mixture until a dough forms. Fold in chocolate chips.Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from the oven and let cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
